org.orgName: United States Bureau of Colored Troops (U.S.C.T.)

body.p: Established on May 22, 1863. Approximately 186,000 soldiers enrolled in this bureau during the war. State regiments were organized in Alabama, Arkansas, Connecticut, Iowa, Kansas, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Mississippi, Missouri, North Carolina, Rhode Island, South Carolina, and Tennessee. Twenty-four artillery and 137 infantry United States Colored Troops (U.S.C.T.) regiments were organized at the Federal level.
